typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		UnitPrice as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesSourceFile
DerivingCheapOrExpensive split(Country=='United Kingdom',
	Country=='Spain',
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitOnCountry@(UKCustomers, SpainCustomers, Default)
SalesSourceFile derive(PriceType = case( UnitPrice<3,'Cheap',
       UnitPrice>3,'Expensive')) ~> DerivingCheapOrExpensive
SalesSourceFile aggregate(groupBy(Country),
	TotalSpend = sum(Quantity*UnitPrice)) ~> SpentByCountry
SpentByCountry rank(desc(TotalSpend, true),
	output(Rnk as long)) ~> RankingBySpends
RankingBySpends filter(Rnk<5) ~> FilterByRank
SplitOnCountry@UKCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesOutputUK.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SalesOutputFileUK
SplitOnCountry@SpainCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesSpain.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SalesOutputFileSpain
SplitOnCountry@Default sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesOutputROW.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SalesOutpuROW
FilterByRank sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CountryWiseSpend.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CountryWiseSpend
